title: Pyrolytic fragmentation-induced defect formation in formamidinium lead halide perovskite thin film and photovoltaic performance limits
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01075B, Paper
Byung-wook Park, Geonhwa Kim, Chinnathambi Kamal, Bongjin S Mun, Ute B. Cappel, Hakan Rensmo, Ki-jeong Kim, Michael Odelius, Sang Il Seok
Perovskite solar cells (PSCs) based on formamidinium (FA+) lead tri-halide (FAPbI3) have achieved remarkable power conversion efficiencies exceeding 26%. However, achieving both commercially available device stability and reaching the Shockleyâˆ’Queisser...
